name: Shield Guardian
description: A large, towering humanoid construct resembling a golem, made of magical materials to serve and protect its master.
memorable: Its ability to absorb damage for its master and cast stored spells on command makes it a formidable ally.
goals: To protect its master and intercept threats during combat.
relations: Often found alongside powerful spellcasters or guarding valuable treasures.
environment: Typically located in arcane workshops, wizard towers, or near magical artifacts.
strengths: Incredibly durable with high hit points, can regenerate health, and has powerful melee attacks.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma impede strategic planning and social interactions.
attacks: Uses a multiattack to perform two powerful fist strikes, dealing high bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Its magic absorption ability allows it to take half the damage meant for its master.
senses: Keen sight within 10 feet and darkvision up to 60 feet aid in perceiving its surroundings.
skills: Offers strong defensive capabilities through damage absorption and granting AC bonuses to its master.
additional_information: Magically bound to an amulet, allowing command from its wearer.
Immunity to poison, psychic damage, and various conditions.
Regeneration ability enabling it to regain HP at the start of its turn.
Spell Storing capacity enabling it to cast designated spells on command.
Constructed nature negating needs for air, food, or sleep.
spellcasting: Can store and cast spells of 4th level or lower using its master's command.

towering construct that defends its master
golem with spellcasting abilities and regeneration
durable magical guardian for wizards and mages
heavy hitter that protects its spellcaster master
